author: Jeffrey Uy

text:
1) Megaman X.¬†¬† Loved exploring and re-exploring the stages, and how much mobility you have in that game (dash-jumping off walls, etc.).
2) Woodman in MM2; I absolutely¬† loved how you could 1-shot him with Heatman's charged up weapon :P
3) Probably something from X, though it's been a while since I've played any of them.
4) Protoman with his light saber and (presumably) Jedi powers.¬† "This isn't the robot master you're looking for." // ping ping ping (as Megaman's shots are reflected right back at him).

text: 1) Megaman 9 ("but why not 2 or 3" Because 2 wasn't THAT good. It was the first game to nail the megaman formula right, but some things weren't that good, such as the overpowered metal blades, the upsetting ending, wily stage 4, the fact all the bosses are too easy, etc. Megaman 3 was about as good, IMO, but it had friggin' top man. And the doc robots. 9was the series's grand return, thank god.) 2) Tough call, but I'd say skull man. 3) TITLE SCREEN FROM MEGAMAN 3 THATS ONE OF MY FAVORITE VGMS O

author: Fengshen

text:
1. MM2 for being the best game in the series so far, it had the best challenges without becoming impossible to play and the coolest levels by far!

2. Metal Man: He looks cool and I like his passive attack style: unless you come too close or fire at him, he'll just stand there and do nothing. His weapon is coolest by far and the accuracy with which he throws! <3

3: MM2 Woodman and MM2 Dr. Wily Stage 1/2

4: MegaMan all the way! He's like Chuck Norris.
author: Fengshen

text:
1. MM3 for having all the MM2 Robot Masters AND Proto Man.
2. I'd say either Metal Man or Knight Man (their just both bad ass, Metal having an awesome weapon and Knight for just looking cool)
3. MM2 Dr Wily Stage 1/2
4. Both, because Mega Man beats Proto Man and he can have other weapons, while Proto Man is cooler, he knows when Wily is trying to trick Mega Man and actually saves him, and gives him his shield in MM7. I think their pretty equal.

text:
1.  Mega Man 2. Sadly, just gotta go with the first Mega Man game I played. I hadn't played any games past MM5, though. Without going into the X series.

2. Favorite  level? I enjoy playing Spark Man's level. Favorite weapon? The overpowered Metal Man's "Metal Blade" (second place being Quick Boomerang). Favorite design? Gemini Man was an interesting fight due to the "twin" nature.

3. I find myself humming Elec Man's theme a lot. Otherwise? Bubble Man.

4. Neither/both. They're not enemies.

text:
@DirtyColossus7 
(Continued)
Ve interrupt this program vith terrible news. Dr. Light has been kidnapped by... GUESS WHO!?
DR. WILY! That's who! I'm comin' after you, too!

WRONG.

LOOOOOOOOOL! You're doomed!

Thanks, Wily! It's Not like I got shit to do. Why not waste all of my energy fuckin' with you!? C'mon, Rush, we gotta go'n save Dr. Light, and then teach Dr. Wily the wrong from the right!

text: I'm a super fightin' robot from the year 2010 on a quest from Dr. Light to make the city safe again! See, all these robots were created to make the planet safe 'till Dr. Wily double-crossed us and set fire to the place! Dr. Wily had other plans to take over this bitch, reprogrammed my brother and stole all them shitz. My name is Mega Man on my jet dog Rush. Got a cannon arm for ya to keep your mouth shut. C'mon!
